snippet: Some analysts said Research in Motion’s delay of a new line of phones and a BlackBerry operating system was caused by poor performance, not the need for new chips.
abstract: Analysts say Research in Motion’s delay of a new line of phones and a BlackBerry operating system was caused by poor performance, not the need for new chips; new phones are considered vital to reversing the company's rapid loss of market share in North America.
lead_paragraph: Some analysts said Research in Motion’s delay of a new line of phones and a BlackBerry operating system was caused by poor performance, not the need for new chips.

headline.seo: RIM’s Delay Caused by Poor Performance, Analysts Say
headline.main: Analysts See Performance Issues Behind RIM’s Delays
headline.print_headline: Analysts See Performance Issues Behind RIM’s Delays
